lyrics:
33 contributorstranslationsespañoltürkçefriend lyricsverse 1
pictures of the old us got me feelin older
i just thought you should know i never wanted closure
but you had no problem leavin
now im the one to feel it

chorus
i just cant believe you dont know what im feeling
guess you got the best of this
pickin up the pieces you just wanna leave em
killing me a little bit
and i hate the way you love me
and i hate that i still care
funny how you feel like we would ever talk again
how could you think id be your friend

verse 2
im sure youre doin fine but i dont wanna hear it
and if i left my tshirt you can keep it
i dont wanna see you again if its different
cause ill only see all the things that im missin
and i shouldve cut all the ties but i didnt i didnt let go mmm

chorus

you might also likebridge

now im the one to feel it
